## Description {#details}

<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/record">Record</a> instruction ordering so we can query their relative positions within a function.

Meta instructions are given the same ordinal as the preceding non-meta instruction. Class state is invalid if MF is modified after calling initialize.

Definition at line 30 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/dbgentityhistorycalculator-h">DbgEntityHistoryCalculator.h</a>.
